repo_notes.content: 使用中文构建文档，介绍本项目的作用

pages.title: 概览
pages.purpose: 介绍 THMI Mod Manager, 解释其作为 Touhou Mystia Izakaya Mod 管理器的用途

pages.title: 开始使用
pages.purpose: 指导用户完成设置指南，以开始使用

pages.title: 安装
pages.purpose: 解释此程序的环境需求，告知用户

pages.title: First Launch & Setup Wizard
pages.purpose: Walk through the setup wizard experience, initial configuration options, and what happens on first application start

pages.title: User Guide
pages.purpose: Comprehensive guide to using THMI Mod Manager's features from an end-user perspective

pages.title: Settings & Configuration
pages.purpose: Detail all available settings including language, theme, cursor, launch mode, date/time formats, and developer options

pages.title: Launching the Game
pages.purpose: Explain game launch modes (Steam vs external), game status monitoring, stopping the game, and title modification features

pages.title: Managing Mods
pages.purpose: Describe mod management features including enable/disable/delete operations and planned future functionality

pages.title: Updates & Notifications
pages.purpose: Explain the update checking system, auto-update configuration, browser notifications, and release notes viewing

pages.title: Debug Panel
pages.purpose: Document the debug panel's features including system information, API testing, configuration management, and log viewing

pages.title: Architecture Overview
pages.purpose: Provide a high-level overview of the application's architecture including frontend, backend, and communication patterns

pages.title: Application Bootstrap
pages.purpose: Detail the application startup sequence, command-line arguments, permission checks, and initialization process

pages.title: Service Architecture
pages.purpose: Explain the dependency injection container, registered services, and service dependencies

pages.title: Middleware Pipeline
pages.purpose: Document the ASP.NET Core middleware pipeline including localization, setup wizard checks, and request handling

pages.title: Frontend Architecture
pages.purpose: Describe the Razor Pages structure, client-side JavaScript patterns, and polling-based communication with backend

pages.title: Backend API Layer
pages.purpose: Document the RESTful API endpoints, controller structure, and request/response patterns

pages.title: Core Systems
pages.purpose: Deep dive into the major functional subsystems that power the application

pages.title: Game Launcher System
pages.purpose: Comprehensive documentation of the game launching system including Steam integration, external launchers, process monitoring, and window manipulation

pages.title: Settings Management System
pages.purpose: Explain settings storage, loading, saving, and the client-server interaction for configuration management

pages.title: Localization System
pages.purpose: Detail the INI-based localization system, culture detection, fallback mechanisms, and multi-language support

pages.title: Update System
pages.purpose: Document the GitHub-based update checking, downloading, and application mechanisms

pages.title: Session Time Tracking
pages.purpose: Explain the hybrid client-server session time tracking system and display synchronization

pages.title: Advanced Topics
pages.purpose: Cover advanced features and security considerations for power users and developers

pages.title: Window Title Modification
pages.purpose: Detail the window title modification feature including the scoring algorithm, retry logic, and permission requirements

pages.title: Permission Management
pages.purpose: Explain administrator privilege detection, UAC integration, and elevation mechanisms

pages.title: CVE Detection & Security
pages.purpose: Document the CVE-2025-59489 detection system, Unity Player vulnerability checking, and security warnings

pages.title: Backend Connection & Error Recovery
pages.purpose: Explain the backend health checking system, connection loss detection, and recovery strategies

pages.title: Internationalization
pages.purpose: Cover the multi-language support and translation contribution process

pages.title: Supported Languages
pages.purpose: List all 11 supported languages with their locale codes and example translations

pages.title: Contributing Translations
pages.purpose: Guide for contributors on INI file format, translation conventions, and submission process
